bib.title: Approaching plWordNet 2.0
bib.author: Maziarz, Marek and Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stan
bib.abstract: We focus on the description of the Polish lexical system, so proper names (PNs) get very  limited coverage in plWordNet. PNs are a very large, open category, which changes dynamically.  Even if we wanted to select a limited subset, reasonably based on high frequency in a very
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of 6th International Global Wordnet Conference, The Global WordNet Association
